reviewText: I bought this video, and a beginners video on capieroa.  This tape kept my interest for about 15 minutes.  It's like watching a workout video where all the instructor does is sway.  There are no verbal instructions, so you have to just watch and figure it out yourself. There's no challenge, and the model was not very good at doing it in the first place.  I'm very disappointed in the price I paid for the video. It wasn't very good.
